articles.author: Sara Boboltz
articles.title: 900,000 Americans Estimated To Have Died From COVID-19, Study Says - HuffPost
articles.description: Public health experts agree that official COVID-19 death tolls are undercounts, but there is disagreement over how high the actual tolls are.
articles.content:
Around 905,000 Americans may have died from COVID-19, according to a new study that arrived at a substantially higher number than the official government tally of 577,000 U.S. deaths.

articles.title: If You Can't Get to a COVID-19 Vaccine Site, Here's What to Do - Healthline
articles.description: As appointments for COVID-19 vaccines become easier to secure, there’s a population of Americans who have had a much harder time accessing the vaccine: homebound individuals. We talked to experts about how people unable to leave their home can get the vaccine.
articles.content:

articles.title: One out of three Americans fully vaccinated for COVID-19, CDC says | Saltwire - SaltWire Network
articles.description:
(Reuters) -     The United States has fully vaccinated 110,874,920 people for COVID-19 as of Friday morning, accounting for 33.4% of the population, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday.

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: Fil-Am Remy Martin declares for NBA Draft - Rappler
articles.description: Filipino-American Remy Martin ends his NCAA career for Arizona State as one of the Sun Devils' all-time leaders in several departments
articles.content: In his senior year, Martin averaged 19.1 points on a 43% clip to go with 3.7 assists, 2.8 rebounds, and 1.2 steals for the Sun Devils, who racked up a 7-10 record in the Pac-12 conference.
